name: YouTube Shorts to Regular
description: Convert YouTube Shorts to Regular YouTube is a simple, user-friendly Chrome extension that transforms YouTube Shorts URLs into standard YouTube video URLs. When you're on a YouTube Shorts video, simply click the extension icon, and it will automatically convert the video's URL. Now, you can enjoy your favorite short videos with all the features offered on standard YouTube videos, like viewing comments, seeing related videos, and more.
author: Boris Mwanga
